aside.p: Continue polishing questions so that they have a success post-question phase, the game-choice boxes are properly checked, and some minor formatting issues managed. Also lift the restriction that administrator e-mail information must be set. If it's not, players simply are not e-mailed. This is reflected in the administrator instructions. A significant bug has been ferreted out and fixed related to counting players for round advancement.
Add a new view for administrators: the projected number of participants over the rounds. Also fix up some language in the administrator view and add more information on players.
